page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW 1
page.content: We divided our block into kilometre suqares and each square was surveyed by 3 pupils and a teacher to discover and plot land use and amenities. The results showed that most of the block is grassland,mainly for cattle grazing,with some arable crops and some fruit.The houses were mainly isolated farmhouses,most built in lacal Hamstone and very attractive.There are few amenities and little public transport,most people having motor cars,which are necessities rather than luxuries in this type of area.Most people go into Yeovil for shopping and entertainment. The following accounts were written by 2nd and 3rd year pupils at{Westfield {Comprehensive School,Yeovil.}
